LINE_date_p20.description: LINE1 Pyrosequencing plate (Date) sample was run on (batch)

H19_date_p20.description: H19 Pyrosequencing plate (Date) sample was run on (batch)

HSD11B2_date_p20.description: HSD11B2 Pyrosequencing plate (Date) sample was run on (batch)

line_1_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 1 of LINE, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

line_2_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 2 of LINE, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

line_3_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 3 of LINE, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

line_4_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 4 of LINE, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

hsd11b2_1_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 1 of HSD11B2, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

hsd11b2_2_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 2 of HSD11B2, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

hsd11b2_3_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 3 of HSD11B2, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

hsd11b2_4_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 4 of HSD11B2, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

hsd11b2_5_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 5 of HSD11B2, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by subtracting 0% control value from same site/same batch

h19_1_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 1 of H19, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by multiplying by (average of all 100% controls for this site)/(100% control value for same site/same batch)

h19_2_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 2 of H19, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by multiplying by (average of all 100% controls for this site)/(100% control value for same site/same batch)

h19_3_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 3 of H19, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by multiplying by (average of all 100% controls for this site)/(100% control value for same site/same batch)

h19_4_adj.description: % methylation at CpG site # 4 of H19, P20 Visit DNA, adjusted for batch by multiplying by (average of all 100% controls for this site)/(100% control value for same site/same batch)
